Entities.Name: LVEF Mention
Entities.Definition: References to Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction in clinical reports.

Sample Data.Annotated Sentence: The left ventricular ejection fraction was estimated at 55%.

Entities.Name: LVEF Quantitative Value
Entities.Definition: Numerical values representing the percentage of blood ejected from the left ventricle.

Sample Data.Annotated Sentence: The left ventricular ejection fraction was estimated at 55%.

Entities.Name: LVEF Qualitative Assessment
Entities.Definition: Descriptive terms used to assess the left ventricular ejection fraction, such as normal, mildly reduced, or severely reduced.

Sample Data.Annotated Sentence: The ejection fraction was mildly reduced.

Entities.Name: LVSF Mention
Entities.Definition: References to Left Ventricular Systolic Function in clinical notes.

Sample Data.Annotated Sentence: Global left ventricular systolic function was moderately decreased.

Dataset.Name: TUCP EF Year 3 Corpus
Dataset.Details: A dataset including 3,060 clinical notes from VA Health Care sites, containing echocardiography, radiology, and TIU reports, annotated for LVEF mentions, LVSF mentions, qualitative assessments, and quantitative values.
Dataset.Link: Not explicitly mentioned in the document.

Annotation Guidelines.Description: Guidelines for annotating left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF) information in clinical reports, covering mentions, quantitative values, qualitative assessments, and left ventricular systolic function mentions.
